import React from 'react' import { Post } from '../../../types/blog.type' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { deletePost } from '../../blog.reducer' interface Props { post: Post } const PostItem = ({ post }: Props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleDeletePost = (id: string) => { } return (
{post.publishDate}

{post.title}

{post.description}

) } export default PostItem
